name: VR SUPER BIKE RACERS 3D for Cardboard Virtual Reality Viewer Glasses
name_original: VR SUPER BIKE RACERS 3D for Cardboard Virtual Reality Viewer Glasses
description:
Press the Cardboard Trigger or look "START" button to start the game! Look left or right arrows to change bike.

Tilt your head in the direction that you want to move the bike and collect all coins!

There are five different bikes, unlock and enjoy all of them.

This game is for VR Cardboard glasses and other 3D mobile virtual reality headsets.

Suitable for children and all ages.

Have fun !
